statements: UPDATE pharmaceutical_products SET inventory_count = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE pharmaceutical_products SET backorder_count = 10, inventory_count = 50 WHERE product_name = 'Painkiller';
UPDATE pharmaceutical_products SET inventory_count = 100, backorder_count = 20 WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE pharmaceutical_products SET backorder_count = 10, inventory_count = 80 WHERE product_name = 'Pain Relief Tablets'
UPDATE stock_availability SET stock_level = 50 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE backorders SET expected_delivery_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE backorder_id = 201
UPDATE stock_availability SET stock_level = stock_level + 10 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE backorders SET backorder_quantity = 20, expected_delivery_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE backorder_id = 50
UPDATE Products SET quantity_in_stock = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET order_quantity = 10, is_backorder = TRUE WHERE order_id = 5;
UPDATE Products SET quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock + 10, backorder_quantity = backorder_quantity - 5 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE Orders SET is_backorder = TRUE WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE products SET stock_level = 50 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE backorders SET quantity = 20, customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE backorder_id = 5;
UPDATE products SET stock_level = 50, backorder_status = true WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE backorders SET quantity = 10, customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE product_id = 200
UPDATE stock_products SET quantity = 50, price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE suppliers SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890', supplier_name = 'NewSupplier' WHERE supplier_id = 201
UPDATE stock_products SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.1 WHERE product_id = 1001;
UPDATE backorders SET quantity = quantity - 5, order_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE product_id = 2002 AND order_id = 5001;
